column1: The Pit Room////Soooo to let you know
column2: over seasoning is a real thing
column3: and maybe I just happen to have caught y'all slipping on that day but the brisket was way too salty
column4: mainly on the end of the brisket. The bark was perfectly burnt and the fat was melt in your mouth good. I enjoy a nice piece of brisket
column5: maybe I was paying too much attention to the pork ribs that I the brisket got all jealous but I'll just assume y'all slipped up on the seasoning
